briefTitle: An Exploratory Study of the Effect of Treatment Interruption on Safety of Exenatide in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: An Exploratory Study of the Effect of Treatment Interruption on Safety of Exenatide in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
summary: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the anti-exenatide-antibody response to exenatide re-exposure as measured by anti-exenatide antibodies and incidence of treatment-emergent allergy and hypersensitivity reactions following a period of treatment interruption, in patients previously exposed to exenatide.

primaryOutcome.measure: Treatment-emergent Antibody Status (Maximum Titer Level Experienced)

effectByArm.arm: Enrolled But Withdrew Before Receiving Treatment
